channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: European Car Stocks Drop After Flurry of Guidance Cuts
item.description: European car stocks traded lower after Volkswagen, Jeep maker Stellantis and Aston Martin cut their respective annual outlooks.

item.title: Euro Rises After German Regional Inflation Data
item.description: The euro rose after German regional data showed headline inflation eased in September but core and services inflation remained sticky.

item.title: Darden Restaurants earnings disappoint as Olive Garden, fine dining sales struggle
item.description: Olive Garden parent Darden Restaurants reported weaker-than-expected earnings and revenue for its fiscal first quarter.

item.title: We're upping our price target on Costco after another steady quarter fortifies our thesis
item.description: The retailer's fourth-quarter results were mixed, but we have more conviction in Costco's appeal to shoppers.

item.title: We ranked the latest earnings reports from 30 portfolio stocks from great to ugly
item.description: Our companies' performances were reflective of the S&P 500 firms in aggregate.

item.title: Stellantis and Aston Martin shares drop sharply after profit warnings amid China woes
item.description: Stocks of European carmakers hemorrhaged early on Monday as Stellantis and British luxury brand Aston Martin issued profit warnings.

item.title: China Markets Surge in Wild End to the Quarter
item.description: Some investors say what happens there could be key to global markets’ direction in the months ahead.

item.title: Nikkei's Message to Japan's New Leader: Higher Taxes Are Bad for Stocks
item.description: The Nikkei Stock Average saw its largest tumble in eight weeks on fears of higher taxes under Japan’s incoming Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba.

item.title: Gold Edges Higher on U.S. Rate Cut Expectations, Middle East Risks
item.description: Gold edged higher in early European trading, driven by optimism around further U.S. rate cuts and demand for safe-haven assets spurred by heightened g...

item.title: H&M shares fall as much as 8% on profit miss and scrapped earnings margin target
item.description: Shares of H&M tumbled as much as 8% on Thursday after the world's second-largest listed fashion retailer posted a miss on operating profit.
